attributes.action: We should declare full scale military action against ISIS.
attributes.background: To reduce further attacks like Westminster Britain should declare full scale military action against Isis and all similar groups. It should further stop selling military technology to certain middle eastern states who are secretly funding and expanding Isis and Isis like groups.

rejection.details:
The UK is already taking action to combat Daesh (also known as ISIS). We're not sure what specific additional action you would like to be taken. 

You can find out more about what is already happening here:

https://www.gov.uk/government/topical-events/daesh/about
